name: Death Jump 2
description:
Death Jump 2 is a silly, cute, free to play game where you have to share your keyboard.  Featuring 4 maps, 3 modes, multiple power ups and some customization. The  goal is to destroy your enemy by smashing into them. The first person to win 3 rounds is the victor. 

Modes:

Singleplayer: fight alone vs an AI, when someone wins 3 rounds total the game ends.

Multiplayer: fight against a friend, keyboard is shared in this mode, player 1 uses WASD, player 2 uses arrow keys (controls can be changed in options). First to 3 points wins.

Zombies (EXPERIMENTAL): Fight with a friend against rounds of AI zombies, when both players die the game ends. (multiplayer only)

Customization:

With your credits from winning matches buy new customization options, including trails, hats, and glasses.

Maps:

Currently there are 4 maps: default, trainyard, skyscraper and christmas village.

Powerups: 

Powerups spawn randomly during the round.

Notice: this is my first real game, if you find any bugs please email me at: segovostudios@gmail.com
